summary: Tested Dipendenti Salari features: GET /api/dipendenti/salari with filters, DELETE /api/dipendenti/salari/reset-reconciliation, GET /api/dipendenti/salari/riepilogo. All 16 backend tests passed. Frontend Prima Nota Salari tab verified with centered table data and correct Italian euro formatting (€ X.XXX,XX).
seed_data_creation: None - used existing 190 salary records for 2025
context_for_next_testing_agent: Dipendenti Salari features fully tested. Backend APIs working: GET /api/dipendenti/salari (with anno/mese/dipendente filters), DELETE /api/dipendenti/salari/reset-reconciliation, GET /api/dipendenti/salari/riepilogo. Frontend Prima Nota Salari tab has centered table data (text-align: center on all th and td elements) and correct Italian euro formatting using formatEuro function.

features_tested.api_get_salari: PASS - Returns list with filters (anno, mese, dipendente)
features_tested.api_get_salari_riepilogo: PASS - Returns summary with totals per dipendente
features_tested.api_reset_reconciliation: PASS - DELETE endpoint resets riconciliato status
features_tested.api_dipendenti_lista: PASS - Returns unique employee names from salari
features_tested.frontend_prima_nota_tab: PASS - Tab loads correctly with data
features_tested.frontend_table_centering: PASS - All columns have text-align: center
features_tested.frontend_filters: PASS - Periodo and Dipendente filters work
